amendment.description: An amendment numbered 73 printed in Part A of House Report 118-147 to strike sec. 1132 (CLEEN).
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to strike section 1132 that allows the administration to consider expanding the CLEEN program which provides awards to industries to develop and integrate technology that will reduce noise, emissions, and fuel burn.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A025) Failed by recorded vote: 127 - 308 (Roll no. 358).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A025) offered by Mr. Perry.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A025) Failed by recorded vote: 127 - 308 (Roll no. 358).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
